original_title: 蔡依林 Play世界巡迴演唱會
overview: Pop diva Jolin Tsai broke her concert record with the 14-month Play world tour, which started in Taipei in 2015 and brought her all over the world, including Hong Kong, Beijing, Shanghai, Macau, Singapore, USA and Malaysia. A special gift for 2018, Jolin Tsai Play World Tour Live collects live performances from the two-hour concert, including Jolin and Amuro Namie's collaborative stage of I'm Not Yours.
title: Jolin Tsai - Play World Tour LIVE
